name: Alex Rider Stormbreaker [GBA]
description:
Be a teen in MI6 (Britain's secret service)!

Based on the summer blockbuster Alex Rider: Stormbreaker, the video game aims to capture the excitement, suspense and gadgetry of Anthony Horowitz's bestselling series about teen-age spy Alex Rider.

Features

  • Gameplay includes stealth, combat and driving
  • Explore Alex Rider locales, including Ian Rider's house, MI6's training facilities, MI6's secret HQ and Darius Sayle's complex
  • Get mission briefings from Alan Blunt and Mrs. Jones
  • Tons of cool gadgets from Smithers (but no guns!)

The Alex Rider: Stormbreaker movie stars Ewan McGregor, Alicia Silverstone, Mickey Rourke and Alex Pettyfer as Alex Rider. It will be released to theaters in September.
